SMILES.description: A SMILES string representing the chemical.
SMILES.title: Smiles

InChIKey.description: The hashed standard International Chemical Identifier of the chemical to ensure machine-readability.
InChIKey.title: Inchikey

FormulationComponent.description:
This class shall be used when referring to chemicals as a component in a formulation.
    When assembling a formulation based on FormulationComponents, consider, that it
    might be required to use the same fraction type for all the chemicals.

chemical.description: The chemical, which shall be described as a component in a solution .

fraction.description: The unitless fraction of the chemical in the total of the mixture.
fraction.title: Fraction

fraction_type.description: A string defining, what kind of a fraction is given in the formulation. This can be for example molar fractions, volume fractions, mass fractions,.... At the moment only molar fractions are supported.
fraction_type.title: Fraction Type

FormulationComponent.title: FormulationComponent

json_schema_specifications.description:
Parameters to be used with the following quantities:
    `radial_density_function` - `molecular_dynamics_RDF`

formulation.description: The formulation to be simulated. This is required to be provided in units of mol per mol.
formulation.title: Formulation

temperature.description: The temperature, at which the simulation shall be performed.
temperature.title: Temperature

estimated_density.description: An inital guess for the density of the formulation, if available.
estimated_density.title: Estimated Density

json_schema_specifications.title: RDFInput

json_schema_result_output.description:
Results returned from the following quantities:
    'radial_density_function' - 'molecular_dynamics_RDF'

radius.description: The radius at which atoms of the respecive species appear.
radius.title: Radius

pair_title.description: The names of the pairs of atoms considered.
pair_title.title: Pair Title

RDF.description: A collection of the RDF for each pair of atoms.
RDF.title: Rdf

cell_volume.description: The volume of the cell under concideration. Unit: nanometer
cell_volume.title: Cell Volume

cell_formula.description: The composition of the considered cell reporting the number of atoms per type contained in the cell, e.g. Li16 O600 P16 F96 C600 H600
cell_formula.title: Cell Formula

json_schema_result_output.title: RDFOutput
